name: RTCOfferOptions.iceRestart
description: The iceRestart property of the RTCOfferOptions dictionary is a Boolean value which, when true, tells the RTCPeerConnection to start ICE renegotiation.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
